scripts.build:docs: rm -rf docs && jsdoc lib/*.js -t ./node_modules/foodoc/template -d docs -r -e utf8 --readme README.md -c conf.json
scripts.generate:docs: rm -rf docs && jsdoc lib/*.js -t ./node_modules/foodoc/template -d docs -r -e utf8 -c conf.json -R README.md
scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && npm run build:exec
scripts.serve:docs: rm -rf docs && npm run generate:docs && statikk docs --port 4242 --open
